title: Watch James Corden Turn Se7en, The Exorcist and More Into Inappropriate Musicals
text: Watch James Corden Turn Se7en, The Exorcist and More Into Inappropriate Musicals Imagine if when Brad Pitt opened the box in Se7en, not only would he find his wife's dismembered head, but the head then sang. That's exactly what happened on ... Comment Posted Oct. 9, 2015 at 4:33 PM By TV Guide Posted Oct. 9, 2015 at 4:33 PM Imagine if when Brad Pitt opened the box in Se7en , not only would he find his wife's dismembered head, but the head then sang. That's exactly what happened on The Late Late Show Thursday night when James Corden teamed up with Nathan Lane and Crazy Ex-Girlfriend star Rachel Bloom to create inappropriate musical adaptations of Se7en , The Exorcist and The Terminator. Watch the bizarre sketch below. (Full Disclosure: TVGuide.com is owned by CBS.) Other Links From TVGuide.com
